title: Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve

reviews.customers_say: Customers find the bolero cardigan fits well, with one mentioning it accommodates in a 2L belt bag, and appreciate its quality, with one noting it's made of surprisingly thick material. The garment is soft, stretchy, and keeps arms warm during class, while providing good coverage. Customers like its style, with one describing it as a perfect accent bolero, though some mention it runs small.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lived up to its description
items.body: I’m so impressed with this product! Great color, fit , quality, and style! Just what I was looking for. Very comfortable and soft. I was looking to cover my arms on cool nights when wearing a tank dress, I’m so glad I got two colors. Read more
items.author: pina sarlo

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Came all the way to Poland for the Eras Tour
items.body: I flew all the way from Wisconsin to Ireland, and then flew to Poland for two days to see Taylor Swift. This piece needed to check off a few different boxes for me, and it did!! It matched my athletic tennis dress color, and as a bonus, the texture and weight was spot on as well. It was warm enough for the journey to and from the hotel on the train, but specifically after dark when the show was over. The concert itself is so energetic and we danced almost the whole time, so when I got warm, I was able to tie it around my waist under the skirt, and later it also fit in my 2L belt bag with room still for my phone and other small bits and pieces!!! A key part of this arrangement is that we were staying in Ireland, and only flying to be in Poland for just under 48 hours. We flew Ryanair, and needed to fit everything in two backpacks total between myself and my son. This cover took up less room than a pair of crew socks when it was folded up as tiny as possible. There was another bonus to this top that will definitely come in handy for this Wisconsinite-I can wear it under short sleeve tops and jerseys to keep my arms warm, but I don't have all the bulk or restriction of a long sleeve shirt or cold gear top on my body. I am also able to just slip it off without even having to remove the outer shirt. This will help me maintain privacy, but allow me to add and remove a layer of clothing to adjust for temperature changes or working out. Read more
items.author: Keara

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars A TINY bit on the small side but still great
items.body: I think I am going through perimenopause because I have been getting a lot of hot flashes lately. Sometimes I get a bit chilly but since I am so sensitive to heat, wearing a sweater these days is usually out of the question. So this is the perfect compromise. It gives me just enough coverage providing just enough warmth but not too much to make me start sweating. I have this in a few colors now and I want to get more as winter approaches. I can also easily take it off when I do get too warm. It isn’t as bulky as a sweater and can even fit in my purse in a pinch when I am out. The only criticism I have is that it is a TINY but small but still is great. Plus I am losing weight so it shouldn’t be an issue soon. Also I am going to start taking ballet classes again soon and there will be of great use to keep the muscles of my arms and shoulders warm while I dance. Also it is a TAD expensive for what it is, but the quality is pretty good overall. Read more
items.author: lady.mantis

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really great quality and very soft
items.body: I wasn't sure what to expect as far as comfort, but this thing is so comfortable! It looks small when you take it out of the package but it is stretchy, and surprisingly thick good quality material. It will definitely keep you warm, so probably not something to wear in the heat, because the material is a little on the thicker side. Super duper soft and stretchy and comfortable though! Looks just like the picture, covers my shoulders and my arms and the very top of my back across my shoulder blades. Read more
items.author: WOODA9273

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent quality
items.body: Great style, quality fabric and sewn beautifullly. Fabric is like a mid to heavy weight legging. Doesn't add much warmth during winter, hoping that also means won't be too hot in summer. Definitely better than being bare armed. Tight weave of fabric will not allow sun on arms - great SPF. Size seems accurate. I sized up in case and didn't need to. Blueberry and Olive green colors are as depicted. I wear shrug / sleeves every day in summer, have more than 20. These will be my favorite if they don't hold heat. Would love to see these made in a more lightweight fabric. Read more
items.author: Jenny

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and durable
items.body: Cutest bolero cover up!! I love how it doesn’t cover the whole front of your shoulders but just the underarms. I also love how the back comes down far enough to cover up bra straps, and it stays flat!! The material is amazingly soft and pretty breathable! You can move your arms easily lol no robot movements. Read more
items.author: Bee Sweet

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Order one size up
items.body: Fits cute but run small.. Have not washed it yet, so cannot give it five stars until I do. Read more
items.author: Cynthia DeMarco

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good fit material is like yoga pants/scuba
items.body: Nice but has a sort of scuba feel or like yoga pants. Im 5'3 about 195 and got the large. Fits great over my meaty arms!!! Read more
items.author: Karen Mills

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Iron Grey, Rum Raisin/Mulch, Olive Green, Rumba Red, Black and White, Black, Deep Lagoon, Iron Grey/Grey, Blueberry, Pastel Yellow, Bellwether Blue, Racing Red, Mink, Steel Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
